body: $AAPL holy fukk
$AAPL $TSLA  fun fact. If you would of just bought shares like a man in January of last year you would still be nowhere near your average as people freak out this year.

$AMZN this is sad many retailers got wiped out I hope music starts again if not history repeats for generation new investors will tell their grand kids don't invest in stock......history will repeat I don't know why big dealer aka market makers want normal people out with depression or negativity instead they should let investor investing market makes new highs only and short selling needs to be ban.....so corporate has more money to actually put it on good use in humanity get go to Mars already let's go do space tourism.....let's GO 500 years ahead in next 10 years in technology......but no those who control this world finance countries is greedy they want it all for them in next 50,000 light years. These power should be divided in all but no they need people to work in Macdonald and send to school and go with the process Shame! $SPY $TSLA $AAPL

$SPY $AAPL $NVDA  WS/PE/VC have been reckless on the way up, pumping out garbage SPACs and garbage IPOs. They know losses are socialized and will beg Powell for a bailout when their funds go under. 
This began with Alan Greenspan pumping and dumping markets.
@PilotZee @Ravich What about the innovation of the Apple 🍎 products in recent years,Timmy Cook is boring but smart.. 3T before the earning release. $AAPL
$AAPL We'll see how this holds up at the beginning of the week. Hope I get cheap puts for earnings.
$AAPL barely down from ath while world economy crashes and we’ll still get a divy? Best investment ever.
$AAPL Let's Go Brandon..🥁🥁🥁Let's go Brandon..Build Back Better ..returns.

$AAPL Most of this drop happened after hours. I was thinking about getting in at $163 around the close.  My limit stop lose triggered shortly after the open at 163 so I was waiting all day to get back in.  I didn’t see this price until now. I like all of you retailers that are in the market for profit and security. What has happened the last two weeks with the market crashing down time after time is disheartening My wife and I lost  10’s of thousand of dollars the past three days as have many of you. The SEC is a joke and it will take years to get back to where this nightmare started. I’m long and unfortunately a bag holder now with Ford , Apple and some other holdings.

After NFLX missed guidance, the street is ready to destroy any company that misses in this area.    Good time to check your confidence level in your management team for stocks you own.     
 
Feeling great about $NVDA $AMD $TSLA in this regard -- $AAPL too

The industry average ROA is 5.50%. $AAPL outperforms 97% of its industry peers. https://www.chartmill.com/stock/quote/AAPL/fundamental-analysis?key=bb853040-a4ac-41c6-b549-d218d2f21b32&utm_source=stocktwits&utm_medium=FA&utm_content=AAPL&utm_campaign=social_tracking

body:
$AAPL vanguard didddd purchase a small 56.5 million  
shares january 3rd.. if they liked it then, I love it now

@Johnny1willy @Vol888 @ponderevo @SeaofTrades @ProfOmar I will tell you something right now. None of us know where the bottom is. Most of the TA doesn’t work on indices. Machines rule the world. Today could be huge gamma squeeze for all we know. I can however tell you few things that are factual. 

1. Bear markets don’t last very long. We have been in bear market for growth and small caps for almost a year. 

2. Yes we can drop another 10-15% from here but I highly doubt it because there’s no real worries other than inflation and supply chain/ potential Russia war issue. 

3. Bears will tell you we have 20% more to go and once we get there they will say another 20% and so on. Most TA has failed. Look at how many people have been calling tops and bottoms for last 1-2 years on failed charts and garbage crayon Bs and failed. The data that @Vol888 posts is useful and helps understand the markets. Everyone got hit. Big tech has started to get hit. $AAPL hasnt been hit yet. That’s a worry
